column2: Anders Stenström''' (b. [[1957]]) is a Swedish [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] scholar.
Stenström has been an enthusiast of Tolkien
column4: when he became a member of the Tolkien Society [[Forodrim]]

column1: Beregond has researched different aspects of the works of Tolkien (among his contributions can be found suggestions on principles for [[structural references]])
column3: and been a speaker at and organizer of conferences and conventions. Together with Kristina Valinger
column4: Beregond was responsible for the creation of the Swedish subtitles for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|Peter Jackson's ''The Lord of the Rings'']]. He was consulted for [[Erik Andersson]]'s new Swedish translation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

column1: He is currently one of the organizers of [[Omentielva]]
column2: the International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkien's Invented Languages
column3: a series of biennial conferences at changing locations. He is also editor of [[Arda (annual)|''Arda'']] and ''Arda Philology''.
Botkyrka]] within the [[wikipedia:Stockholm urban area|Stockholm urban area]] and works as a [[wikipedia:Verger#Modern function|verger]].
